abstract: All the entrepreneurs out there dreaming about being acquired by Google should take note: The two founders of Dodgeball, a mobile social-networking service Google bought in 2005, have quit, saying the company “wasn’t supporting Dodgeball the way we expected.”
lead_paragraph: All the entrepreneurs out there dreaming about being acquired by Google should take note: The two founders of Dodgeball, a mobile social-networking service Google bought in 2005, have quit, saying the company “wasn’t supporting Dodgeball the way we expected.”

headline.main: A Deal With Google Ends With Some Bruised Feelings
